name: Alexander Toth
title: Software Engineer · Audio-Visual Programmer · Composer
summary: C++ / OpenGL developer with a background in computer music and real-time graphics.

bullets: Built a real-time audio-reactive visualizer in C++/OpenGL, sustaining 144 FPS.
Authored cross-platform audio engine (Miniaudio + GLFW + ImGui).

experience.role: Adjunct Instructor — Intro to Computer Music
bullets: Designed curriculum, taught Ableton Live and basic DSP to undergraduate and graduate students.

education.school: Indiana University Jacobs School of Music

education.degree: B.M. Vocal Performance with Licensure to Teach
